top.title: Blair and Rubio among names on Gaza 'Board of Peace'
top.summary: The former UK prime minister and US secretary of state will sit on the "founding executive board", the White House says.

top.title: Exiled crown prince urges world to help protesters topple Iran's government
top.summary: Reza Pahlavi, a US-based opposition figure, called on the world to target Iran's Revolutionary Guards leadership.

top.title: US justice department investigating Minnesota Democrats over alleged obstruction of ICE
top.summary: It comes as fresh details emerged in the death of a Minneapolis woman shot last week by an ICE agent in the city.

top.title: ChatGPT to carry adverts for some users
top.summary: OpenAI is also expanding its cheaper subscription tier, ChatGPT Go, to all countries where it operates.

top.title: Mother of Elon Musk's child sues xAI over Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The parent company of X and Grok, xAI, launched a counter-suit saying she had violated its terms of service.

top.title: Use film-style age ratings to limit teens' social media, say Lib Dems
top.summary: The Conservatives want to see ban of all under-16s from social media, but the Lib Dems say that would be a "blunt instrument".
